Cloverfield is an excellent movie. Entertained me at least ALOT. wich few films today do.

Cloverfield meets War of the Worlds meets Godzilla. Decent acting with main character played by Eric Balfour of Valemont (MTV) and Haven (SyFy)  fame. Also, from the ending, it looks like there could possibly be a sequel.
